mapper.select: select fpi.id, fpi.user_id, fpi.start_point, fpi.the_way, fpi.end_point, fpi.start_time, su.username, su.tel, ci.car_color, ci.car_num, ci.full_seat from find_person_info fpi left join sys_user su on fpi.user_id = su.id left join car_info ci on fpi.car_id = ci.id order by create_time desc limit ${page},${limit}
